name: Teeny Lemon Clicker
description:
A game where you click lemons to buy upgrades to get more lemons to buy more upgrades to get more lemons! Very original.

This project was completed in around 12 hours of work so don't be too harsh.

(The quit button just stops the game in the browser by the way)

Download Standalone Application Here!
https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1llVZj6KXY-Y0Cd6nrOxb_AuDFh7WARDR?usp=sharing
